name: Marathon Management System
description: A platform for managing marathon events, including participant registration, race tracking, and results publishing.
challenges: Implementing real-time data sync and authentication with Firebase while maintaining responsive UI across devices.
futurePlans: Add admin dashboards with analytics and enhance user profiles with more race statistics.

name: Blood Donation Platform
description: A platform that connects blood donors and recipients, allowing users to request or offer blood donations.
challenges: Ensuring quick search functionality for available donors based on blood type and location.
futurePlans: Integrate geolocation and automated notifications for urgent blood needs.

name: ABZ Innovation Corporate Website
description: A professional corporate website showcasing ABZ Innovation's services, portfolio, and contact options.
challenges: Maintaining high performance and SEO optimization while implementing a fully customized WordPress theme.
futurePlans: Add a blog section and integrate a CRM for client inquiries.
